name: Library Management System
description: A static demonstration of a library management system with a multi-page interface. Built in a single HTML file with Vanilla JavaScript, it defaults to a dashboard view with statistics and a genre distribution chart. The library view includes powerful real-time search, sorting, and filtering by genre and status. The app operates entirely on the client-side and uses localStorage to persist all book data, including check-in/check-out history, across sessions.
